overview: Theo and Cher: Following his all-pain, no gain, day of rodeo competition, Theo welcomes being ridden (for a change) by his in-house-cow-mama, Cher. She's the one saddle Theo could stay in for days.  Tammi and Jimbo: When Tammy gets naked, she does it with her black leather boots on! Jimbo doesn't mind... as long as she leaves her spurs on the nightstand.  Mona Lisa and Dickie: With a name like Mona Lisa, Dickie expected a pretty smile... but one look at her body fills Dick with an insatiable urge to spend lunch nailing her to the wall.
title: Breast Wishes! 8
